title: Update store info: name, phone, hours, and city

requirements.text: Update the pharmacy name to 'Sameer Medical' everywhere it appears across the frontend (Header, HeroSection, AboutUsSection, Footer, and any other components or pages).

quotes: Pharmacy name should be sameer medical

acceptanceCriteria: The store name 'Sameer Medical' is displayed in the Header/logo area
The store name 'Sameer Medical' is displayed in the HeroSection
The store name 'Sameer Medical' is displayed in the AboutUsSection
The store name 'Sameer Medical' is displayed in the Footer
No previous placeholder store name appears anywhere on the site

requirements.text: Update the backend store info to set the pharmacy name to 'Sameer Medical', phone number to '0000999988', operating hours to 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM', and address/city to 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India'.

quotes: Pharmacy name should be sameer medical
timings will be mon-sun morning-10am to 3pm and evening 6pm-10pm
city should be shahabad Karnataka india

acceptanceCriteria: The backend getStoreInfo query returns name 'Sameer Medical'
The backend getStoreInfo query returns phone '0000999988'
The backend getStoreInfo query returns hours 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM'
The backend getStoreInfo query returns city/address as 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India'

requirements.text: Update all frontend components that display store contact info and hours (HeroSection, AboutUsSection, Footer) to show the phone number '0000999988', hours 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM', and location 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India', using data from the backend store info query or updated fallback defaults.

quotes: timings will be mon-sun morning-10am to 3pm and evening 6pm-10pm
city should be shahabad Karnataka india

acceptanceCriteria: Phone number '0000999988' is displayed in the HeroSection quick-info bar, AboutUsSection contact card, and Footer
Hours 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM' are displayed in the HeroSection, AboutUsSection, and Footer
Location 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India' is displayed in the AboutUsSection and Footer
Fallback defaults in components also reflect the updated store details

constraints: Do not change any product listings, categories, or other backend data beyond the store info record
Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Redesigning any visual theme or layout
